name: ThunderFuse
description:
Defend your home from hordes of zombies, board up windows, seal doors, and arm yourself!

WASD - move

Mouse - look

E - interact/pickup

Mouse wheel - select item

Left mouse - use item

Space - jump

Q - drop

F - flashlight

Note: multiplayer is only supported for local connections (unless you use port forwarding) you will need to use a VPN to connect to players on other networks

Remake of an old unfinished jam game
